a.n: Jeff Beck: Live at the Hollywood Bowl

p.d: Celebrated guitarist and Rock ‘n’ Roll Hall of Fame inductee Jeff Beck marks 50 momentous years of electrifying live performances in this concert special filmed live at the Hollywood Bowl. One of the most widely acclaimed guitarists in popular music, Beck is known for his wild mix of blues, funk, and jazz-rock, as well as collaborations with countless luminaries. Playing songs from throughout his career, Jeff is joined on stage with his friends and collaborators including Buddy Guy, Steven Tyler, Jan Hammer, Billy Gibbons, Beth Hart, Rosie, and Jimmy Hall. This night documents a rare moment in rock history with memorable licks and sizzling performances of songs such as: For Your Love, Freeway Jam, Beck’s Bolero, Big Block, Rough Boy, Train Kept-A-Rollin’, Shapes of Things, and the encores; A Day In The Life and Purple Rain.
